executable.title: RadiomicsCLI
executable.description: This provides a commandline interface to access to the radiomics feature extraction implemented in pyradiomics library. See more details at http://pyradiomics.readthedocs.io/.
executable.contributor: Andrey Fedorov (BWH), Nicole Aucoin (BWH), Jean-Christophe Fillion-Robin (Kitware), Joost van Griethuysen (AVL-NKI), Hugo Aerts (DFCI)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially supported by NIH/NCI ITCR program grant U24 CA194354.

image.label: input Label map
image.description: Input label map volume defining the ROI to extract features from

file.description: YAML or JSON structured file defining the customization that is to be applied.

integer.label: ROI label value
integer.description: Integer specifying the value identifying the ROI in the label map from which features will be extracted
